akn:section.akn:heading: Violation of condition of release on citation; failure to appear.

akn:content.akn:p: A person who knowingly fails to abide by a condition of release on citation issued pursuant to ยง 23-584(d)(1) before his or her first appearance before a judicial officer shall be taken into custody in accordance with ยง 23-581 and presented before a judicial officer.
A person who, having been released on a citation issued pursuant to ยง 23-584 or having posted bond pursuant to ยง 23-1110, willfully fails to appear as required shall:
